mapper.select: select id as id ,iaas_type as iaas_type ,network_name as network_name ,public_static_ip as public_static_ip ,subnet_reserved_ip as subnet_reserved_ip ,subnet_static_ip as subnet_static_ip ,availability_zone_1 as azure_network_name_1 ,subnet_id_1 as subnet_id_1 ,security_group_1 as security_group_1 ,subnet_range_1 as subnet_range_1 ,subnet_gateway_1 as subnet_gateway_1 ,subnet_dns_1 as subnet_dns_1 ,subnet_reserved_from_1 as subnet_reserved_from_1 ,subnet_reserved_to_1 as subnet_reserved_to_1 ,subnet_static_from_1 as subnet_static_from_1 ,subnet_static_to_1 as subnet_static_to_1 ,availability_zone_1 as availability_zone_1 ,availability_zone_2 as azure_network_name_2 ,subnet_id_2 as subnet_id_2 ,security_group_2 as security_group_2 ,subnet_range_2 as subnet_range_2 ,subnet_gateway_2 as subnet_gateway_2 ,subnet_dns_2 as subnet_dns_2 ,subnet_reserved_from_2 as subnet_reserved_from_2 ,subnet_reserved_to_2 as subnet_reserved_to_2 ,subnet_static_from_2 as subnet_static_from_2 ,subnet_static_to_2 as subnet_static_to_2 ,availability_zone_2 as availability_zone_2 ,create_user_id as create_user_id ,create_date as create_date ,update_user_id as update_user_id ,update_date as update_date from ieda_hb_cfDeployment_network_config ORDER BY id;

select id as id ,iaas_type as iaas_type ,network_name as network_name ,public_static_ip as public_static_ip ,availability_zone_1 as azure_network_name_1 ,subnet_id_1 as subnet_id_1 ,security_group_1 as security_group_1 ,subnet_range_1 as subnet_range_1 ,subnet_gateway_1 as subnet_gateway_1 ,subnet_dns_1 as subnet_dns_1 ,subnet_reserved_from_1 as subnet_reserved_from_1 ,subnet_reserved_to_1 as subnet_reserved_to_1 ,subnet_static_from_1 as subnet_static_from_1 ,subnet_static_to_1 as subnet_static_to_1 ,availability_zone_1 as availability_zone_1 ,availability_zone_2 as azure_network_name_2 ,subnet_id_2 as subnet_id_2 ,security_group_2 as security_group_2 ,subnet_range_2 as subnet_range_2 ,subnet_gateway_2 as subnet_gateway_2 ,subnet_dns_2 as subnet_dns_2 ,subnet_reserved_from_2 as subnet_reserved_from_2 ,subnet_reserved_to_2 as subnet_reserved_to_2 ,subnet_static_from_2 as subnet_static_from_2 ,subnet_static_to_2 as subnet_static_to_2 ,availability_zone_2 as availability_zone_2 ,create_user_id as create_user_id ,create_date as create_date ,update_user_id as update_user_id ,update_date as update_date from ieda_hb_cfDeployment_network_config where id = #{id}
select count(*) from ieda_hb_cfDeployment_network_config where network_name = #{networkName}
